2902.verse: وَهُوَ|And He|67|74|305$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|147|138$جَعَلَ|made|66|79|195$لَكُمُ|for you|67|80|196$ٱلَّيْلَ|the night|80|93|2742$لِبَاسًا|(as) a covering|121|134|6333$وَٱلنَّوْمَ|and the sleep|110|117|12794$سُبَاتًا|a rest|67|122|12795$وَجَعَلَ|and made|84|195|5086$ٱلنَّهَارَ|the day|75|186|2745$نُشُورًا|a resurrection.|117|172|12701$

2904.verse: لِّنُحْــِۧىَ|That We may give life|165|179|12797$بِهِۦ|thereby|71|98|204$بَلْدَةً|(to) a land|91|118|12798$مَّيْتًا|dead|56|83|5996$وَنُسْقِيَهُۥ|and We give drink|138|165|12799$مِمَّا|thereof|68|82|216$خَلَقْنَآ|(to those) We created,|175|218|7029$أَنْعَـٰمًا|cattle|75|162|12800$وَأَنَاسِىَّ|and men|92|179|12801$كَثِيرًا|many.|72|116|275$

2905.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|101|640$صَرَّفْنَـٰهُ|We have distributed it|167|190|12802$بَيْنَهُمْ|among them|101|124|1056$لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ|that they may remember,|189|212|10370$فَأَبَىٰٓ|but refuse|88|99|10529$أَكْثَرُ|most|64|122|9290$ٱلنَّاسِ|(of) the people|120|236|75$إِلَّا|except|65|181|86$كُفُورًا|disbelief.|78|136|10530$

2906.verse: وَلَوْ|And if|58|76|179$شِئْنَا|We willed,|87|124|7000$لَبَعَثْنَا|surely, We (would) have raised|226|263|12803$فِى|in|48|85|89$كُلِّ|every|57|94|185$قَرْيَةٍ|town|65|83|2319$نَّذِيرًا|a warner.|83|83|12696$

2908.verse: ۞ وَهُوَ|And He|106|115|305$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|151|138$مَرَجَ|(has) released|115|132|12807$ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ|the two seas|107|124|10874$هَـٰذَا|[this] (one)|97|114|248$عَذْبٌ|palatable|80|89|12808$فُرَاتٌ|and sweet|89|99|12809$وَهَـٰذَا|and [this] (one)|126|146|2989$مِلْحٌ|salty|57|77|12810$أُجَاجٌ|(and) bitter,|102|122|12811$وَجَعَلَ|and He has made|134|154|5086$بَيْنَهُمَا|between them|115|125|3978$بَرْزَخًا|a barrier|84|176|12812$وَحِجْرًا|and a partition|117|302|12813$مَّحْجُورًا|forbidden.|104|196|12737$

2909.verse: وَهُوَ|And He|67|86|305$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|171|138$خَلَقَ|has created|99|136|299$مِنَ|from|50|87|156$ٱلْمَآءِ|the water|85|122|6434$بَشَرًا|human being|103|122|8435$فَجَعَلَهُۥ|and has made (for) him|174|183|12814$نَسَبًا|blood relationship|135|153|12815$وَصِهْرًا‌ۗ|and marriage relationship.|190|208|12816$وَكَانَ|And is|71|89|363$رَبُّكَ|your Lord|82|91|310$قَدِيرًا|All-Powerful.|103|103|4537$

2910.verse: وَيَعْبُدُونَ|But they worship|132|142|8058$مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ|besides Allah|143|162|2971$مَا|what|53|72|262$لَا يَنفَعُهُمْ|not profits them|127|146|12817$وَلَا|and not|71|90|25$يَضُرُّهُمْ‌ۗ|harms them,|102|112|972$وَكَانَ|and is|71|104|363$ٱلْكَافِرُ|the disbeliever|116|182|12818$عَلَىٰ|against|68|134|52$رَبِّهِۦ|his Lord|71|138|392$ظَهِيرًا|a helper.|83|116|10527$

2899.verse: Or do you think that most of them hear or reason? They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are [even] more astray in [their] way.

2900.verse: Have you not considered your Lord - how He extends the shadow, and if He willed, He could have made it stationary? Then We made the sun for it an indication.

2901.verse: Then We hold it in hand for a brief grasp.

2902.verse: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep [a means for] rest and has made the day a resurrection.

2903.verse: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy, and We send down from the sky pure water

2904.verse: That We may bring to life thereby a dead land and give it as drink to those We created of numerous livestock and men.

2905.verse: And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded, but most of the people refuse except disbelief.

2906.verse: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner.

2907.verse: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving.

2908.verse: And it is He who has released [simultaneously] the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter, and He placed between them a barrier and prohibiting partition.

2909.verse: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].

2910.verse: But they worship rather than Allah that which does not benefit them or harm them, and the disbeliever is ever, against his Lord, an assistant [to Satan].
